11122.quoteText: Where possible, we use services that are hosted within the European Union.

11123.quoteText:
Using your data

There are a number of ways that we may use or share your data in order to provide our services.
11123.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

11124.quoteText: If you believe your personal data has been processed incorrectly or incompletely, you may request that we change or supplement the data (rectification).
11124.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

11125.quoteText: We will only use your data upon your approval and/or if it is necessary to perform agreements.
11125.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

11625.quoteText: We take all steps necessary to ensure that your data is stored securely and used only in accordance with the preferences you have requested.
11625.title: The user is informed about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices

12326.quoteText: We do not and will not sell your data.
12326.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

12327.quoteText: We do not keep your data for any longer than necessary to fulfil the purposes for which we collected the data or the purposes for which data are reused.
12327.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

tosdr.case: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

12328.quoteText:
We use Google Analytics to understand our usersâ€™ needs and optimise our service (e.g.
how many views each page receives, whether people return to our website, what routes people take through our web pages).
12328.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

12329.quoteText: If you have any questions for us or suggestions on how to improve the information on this page, please contact us via info@rightsstatements.org.
12329.title: The service provides a free help desk

tosdr.case: The service provides a free help desk

12330.quoteText:
If you have a complaint concerning the processing of your personal data by the RightsStatements.org Consortium or Europeana Foundation, please

  1. contact us via info@rightsstatements.org;
  2. contact your local Data Protection Authority (DPA).
12330.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
